channel.title: Western Devs :: Panel discussions on .NET, software practices, and smoked meat
channel.itunes:subtitle: Semi-regular technical discussions on various topics
channel.itunes:author: Western Devs
channel.itunes:summary: A group of software developers, mostly from western Canada, mostly in the Microsoft .NET space, and all west of someplace else get together to discuss topics that tickle their fancy.
channel.description: A group of software developers, mostly from western Canada, mostly in the Microsoft .NET space, and all west of someplace else get together to discuss topics that tickle their fancy.

item.title: Working From Home
item.description: Yeah, so Pokemon Go was still a thing when we originally recorded this. Add procrastination to the list of hazards for working from home.

item.itunes:summary: Yeah, so Pokemon Go was still a thing when we originally recorded this. Add procrastination to the list of hazards for working from home.

item.title: Career Planning
